Message.Title: One only needz to look at the yahoo boardz to understand sentiment
Message.Msg: take for example this pig.... No posting... No loverz, no haterz.... Just spammerz.... When the emomo goez so too does the momo mojo.... No momo, no hating crackhead put buyerz are all wrung out, and shorts year over year have succome to the fido robo squeeze that seemz without end... There'z a recon'in a come'in. Its gonna be a biiiig drop.... One only needz to look at the boardz when theze levelz were 1st reached and then broken to the upside in jan then compare them to the board criez and action now to no that the intrigue, the fido ooooorgy, and the sore ars holez are history.... Fido Distribution iz in full play at high volume unloading on the way up... This pig got way high into thin air and iz looking down like wile E Coyote when the land iz gone beneath hiz feet.... Bubeye scamazon... Its been a fun ride up, now lonely ol sybs iz gonna have to enjoy the ride down az most otherz have either jumped or been thrown by robots to their deaths. Pigz at the top act this way, and one must realize that trading to win iz truely lonely. :) Next week beginz the screamz of baggiez, and the excitement of knife catcherz az they step in the way of knivez falling at terminal velocity to catch the blade right between the left shoulder and neck and it drops clean through the heart. See you at 180.00, kidz. Sybil cleared all pull back limit coverz in the 240's and 220's... Sybil will not be a 'buy to cover' knife catcher.

Topic.Title: One only needz to look at the yahoo boardz to understand sentiment

Message.Msg: this is the recession play and long machines are following "living social deals" activity. your muni bonds collapse post is pretty colorful, but it was as colorful when u predicted it last year. but look here: once local residents won't be able to handle it anymore they will go against local school districts big time. u should rather start concentrating on the demise of the western civilization in general which is progressing for the last 100 years
Get off this board! You think people are too stupid to know how many ID's one person can create to promote a web site? Don't bother with the link folks...
Agree -- downgrades will be about valuation... that's the way they work. Pump it up. Buy on the way up. Sell at 280. Send it down the well until it hits the water level and make more money!
Its hard to take seriously someone who fallz for a spammerz post....

Message.Msg: As i said when I went long GRPN at $3, GRPN has a much better economics and value proposition for the daily deals business. It is DDE and GRPN has an undrappreciated moat. I actually think the Groupon Goods business is a mistake. Stay focused on service yield management rather than getting into product. The swan is now grey and darkening daily...

Topic.Title: Dont you find it odd that when tax receipts are down and in what should be the most austere of timez that....

Message.Msg: I am not overly optimistic on NFLX long term, but I bought it anyways as a hedge against my AMZN short. I believe short term NFLX can do very well, absent any market crash in 6 months I will get out at $260 and (hopefully) cover my AMZN at $135 lol. Maybe this is too optimistic but I feel that NFLX has some bull sentiment and AMZN is gaining bear sentiment, so I am just betting that AMZN will be down more than NFLX.

Topic.Title: One only needz to look at the yahoo boardz to understand sentiment

Message.Msg: Groupon, pintrest, spreebird.... Tech, one only has to say the namez to realize the stox are az scamish and stupid az the ipo's they issued..... They will all be bk by mid 2015.... Ride the fadz az long az you dare.... Stupid stox in stupid markets.... A real stock might sound like "bethlehem steel", "pittsburg glass company", or "american gas company" without a scam mlp or llc after it.... Plain and simple bread and butter industrial stox in 2016 from s&p 450.... And if they thrive in the 'rebound' (which may very well be a lost 30 yearz) then america haz a chance, and if they go no where they will through off 8% dividendz... If they do neither then nothing iz 'investable' - which may be very well the case. Nonetheless, sybs will be going long some where around s&p 550 ish.

Message.Title: Bad news for shorts: Nikkei down almost 2% right now.
Message.Msg: The DOW and Nikkei very often move in opposite directions. So, the DOW is likely to move higher tomorrow. Now, shorts must pray that AMZN will move in the opposite direction of the DOW.

Topic.Title: Bad news for shorts: Nikkei down almost 2% right now.

Message.Msg: The DOW would also need a time machine. Japan is closed, those are friday's numbers.
